animeDescription: Two Ghibli created shorts about the happenings in a fictional animation studio, presumably based to some extent on their own.
animeStaff: [['Momose Yoshiyuki', ['Director', 'Screenplay']], ['Tanabe Osamu', ['Storyboard', 'Key Animation']], ['Suzuki Toshio', ['Production Manager']], ['Ohira Shinya', ['Key Animation']]]
